member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton
member.summary: Provides properties of the In-place Editor Button.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.OnClick
member.summary: Binds the click event for the In-place Editor buttons.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.Content
member.summary: Defines the text `Content` which is displayed in the Button.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.CssClass
member.summary: Defines the single or multiple CSS classes with space to apply in the Button.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.Disabled
member.summary: Specifies a value that indicates whether the component is enabled or disabled.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in the right to left (RTL) direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.IconCss
member.summary: Defines the single or multiple CSS classes with space to include an icon in the Button.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.IconPosition
member.summary: Place the icon before or after the text content in the Button. The possible values are: Left: Positions the icon on the left side of the text content. Right: Positions the icon on the right side of the text content.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.IsPrimary
member.summary: Specifies a value that determines which button is primary.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.IsToggle
member.summary: Determines whether the button can be on or off. When you click on it, the button's state changes from normal to active.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorButtton.Type
member.summary: Specifies the type of the button. The possible values are: 1.Button 2.Submit 3.Reset

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1
member.summary: Configures the handler to handle the In-place Editor's events.
member.typeparam: Represents the Inplace Editor data source's type.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.OnActionBegin
member.summary: Event triggers before the data is submitted to the server.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.OnActionFailure
member.summary: Event triggers when data submission is failed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.OnActionSuccess
member.summary: Event triggers when the data is submitted successfully to the server.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.BeginEdit
member.summary: Event triggers before changing edit mode from default.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.EndEdit
member.summary: Event triggers when the edit action is finished and begin to submit/cancel the current value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.ValueChange
member.summary: Event triggers when the integrated component value has changed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.Created
member.summary: Event triggers once the component rendering is completed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.Destroyed
member.summary: Event triggers when the component gets destroyed.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorEvents`1.OnInitializedAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component is ready to start.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Dispose the unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings
member.summary: Configures the properties to customize the popup mode of the In-place Editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.Animation
member.summary: Specifies the animation that displays while opening and closing the popup. The animation property allows to set delay, duration, and effect.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.CloseDelay
member.summary: Specifies a duration in milliseconds that will close the popup after a specified delay.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.CssClass
member.summary: Defines the specific user-defined styles to customize the popup.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.Height
member.summary: Specifies the height of the popup which accepts the string values.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.IsSticky
member.summary: Enables to freeze a popup in an open state until it is closed manually.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.OffsetX
member.summary: Specifies an X-coordinate value which is the horizontal space between the target and popup element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.OffsetY
member.summary: Specifies an Y-coordinate value which is the vertical space between the target and popup element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.OpenDelay
member.summary: Specifies a duration in milliseconds that will open the popup after a specified delay.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.OpensOn
member.summary: Determines the mode when invoking the popup. The available open modes are: 1.Auto 2.Hover 3.Click 4.Focus 5.Custom

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.Position
member.summary: Set the position of the popup based on the target element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.ShowTipPointer
member.summary: Determines whether to show or hide the tip pointer on the popup.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.TipPointerPosition
member.summary: Specifies to customize the position of the tip pointer on the popup. The available options are: 1.Auto 2.Start 3.Middle 4.End When set to auto, the tip pointer adjusts its position automatically based on the available space on the target.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.Width
member.summary: Set the width of the popup component which accepts a string value. When set width as auto, the popup width will be adjusted automatically to display its content within the viewable screen.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Adds the additional html attributes to the Popup element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.Title
member.summary: Specifies the title of the editor's popup.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.InPlaceEditorPopupSettings.OnParametersSetAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component has received parameters from its parent.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Dispose the unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Dispose the unmanaged resources.
member.param: Boolean value to dispose the object.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1
member.summary: The In-place Editor component is most useful for editing a value dynamically within its context (in-place). It has the built-in support to handle all the form components, including TextBox, Dropdown List, DatePicker, and Rich Text Editor. The component comes with different edit modes and a fully customizable UI.
member.typeparam: Represents the Inplace Editor data source's type.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.OnInitializedAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component is ready to start.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.OnAfterRenderAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method invoked after each time the component has been rendered.
member.param: Set to true if this is the first time OnAfterRender(Boolean) has been invoked.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.OnParametersSetAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component has received parameters from its parent.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.ID
member.summary: Overridden.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.ChildContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the InPlace Editor element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.ActionOnBlur
member.summary: Specifies the action that is performed when we focus-out from the In-place Editor. It can be a Submit or Cancel or Ignore action.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.Adaptor
member.summary: Specifies the adaptor type that is used by the DataManager to communicate with DataSource.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.CssClass
member.summary: Defines single or multiple classes (separated by space) to be used to customize the In-place Editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.Disabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable or disable the In-place Editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.EditableOn
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable or disable the editing mode.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.EmptyText
member.summary: Sets the text to be shown when a component is Empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.EnableEditMode
member.summary: Specifies to show and hide the editing mode.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.EnablePersistence
member.summary: Enable or disable persisting component's state between page reloads.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable the rendering component in the right to left (RTL) direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.Mode
member.summary: Specifies how to render its components whether in inline or popup mode while editing in the In-place Editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.Name
member.summary: Specifies the name of the component which is used to retrieve data from the server. If the name is not given, then the component ID will be considered as the mapping name.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.PrimaryKey
member.summary: Defines the unique key of an editable field that can be used for saving data in the Database.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.ShowButtons
member.summary: Specifies whether to show or hide the Save and Cancel buttons of the In-place Editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.SubmitOnEnter
member.summary: Enables to trigger the submit action when the enter key is pressed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.Type
member.summary: Specifies the component which is rendered within the In-place Editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.ValueChanged
member.summary: Specifies the callback to trigger when the value changes in the In-place Editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.ValueExpression
member.summary: Specifies the expression for defining the value of the bound.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.SaveUrl
member.summary: Specifies the server URL which triggers on submit action in the In-place Editor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.Value
member.summary: Specifies the display value for the component when the original value is empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: You can add the additional Html attributes such as id, title, etc., to the InPlaceEditor element.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.SfInPlaceEditor`1.SaveAsync
member.summary: Submit the edited input value to the server.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.ActionBlur
member.summary: Specifies the action that is performed when focus-out from the In-place Editor. The available actions are: 1.Submit 2.Cancel 3.Ignore.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.ActionBlur.Submit
member.summary: Specifies to submit a value while focus-out from the In-place Editor.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.ActionBlur.Cancel
member.summary: Specifies to cancel the action while focus-out from the In-place Editor.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.ActionBlur.Ignore
member.summary: Specifies to ignore the action while focus-out from the In-place Editor.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.EditableType
member.summary: Specifies a value when the component changes to the editable mode. The available options are: 1.Click 2.DoubleClick 3.EditIconClick

member.summary: Change to the editable mode when clicking on the In-place Editor.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.EditableType.DoubleClick
member.summary: Change to the editable mode when double-clicking on the In-place Editor.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.InPlaceEditor.EditableType.EditIconClick
member.summary: Change to the editable mode when clicking on the edit icon of the In-place Editor.

member.summary: Defines the render mode as Inline.
